Header: Reconstruction of Meda Oyamaduwa tank in Mahavilalchchiya is to begin tomorrow
Content: Reconstruction of Meda Oyamaduwa tank in Mahavilalchchiya is slated to commence tomorrow under the patronage of Prime Minister Ranil ckremasinghe. The reconstruction will be undertaken under the Climate friendly Irrigation Project mooted by the Ministry of Irrigation and Agriculture. The estimated expenditure on the project is five million rupees. It is planned to reconstruct the Meda Oyamaduwa tank bund, preparation of the bunds and the removal of silt. A large number of farmer families in the area will benefit.
